tasks.label: üêßüöÄ JLINK Flash board (GCC)
args:
echo 'reset
halt
erase 0x08000000 0x081E0000 noreset
loadbin BUILD/BRD4271A/GCC_ARM-RELEASE/${workspaceFolderBasename}.bin,0x08000000
setpc 0x08000000
reset
go
exit' > flash.jlink && JLinkExe -device EFR32FG25BXXXF1920 -autoconnect 1 -NoGui 0 -if SWD -Speed 4000 -CommandFile flash.jlink
